author: Staff Reporter
text:
All arrangements have been made for the transportation of Lakshmi, the 26-year-old temple elephant of Manakula Vinayagar Temple to attend the 48-day rejuvenation camp at Mettupalayam in Coimbatore district.

Special send off

Priests of the temple on Tuesday performed pooja to Lakshmi prior to her transportation. Karunakaran, Executive Officer of Manakular Vinayagar Temple said all prior permissions had been obtained from the concerned authorities and arrangements had been made for the safe travel of Lakshmi to the camp.

Lakshmi along with Prakruti of Dharbaraneswara Swamy temple located in Thirunallar, Karaikal will be participating in the camp for fourth consecutive year.

District Collector E. Vallavan inspected the arrangements ahead of the departure.
title: Temple jumbo takes a break
